text: For the Power of the Soviets () is a 1956О судьбе смоленского актера Анатолия Игнатьева, сыгравшего легендарного героя в кино Soviet drama film directed by Boris BuneevСто двадцать лет назад в Одессе родился писатель Валентин КатаевКинопоказы в галерее "Дом Нащокина"11 АВГУСТА == Plot == The film takes place during the Great Patriotic War. The lawyer Bachey dreamed of going on a trip, but he had to go to the front. He was afraid that he would not soon see his father again, but met him in the Odessa catacombs, where partisans lived, led by a friend of Bachey. Bachey enters his squad...За власть Советов == Cast == * Aleksey Alekseev as General * Boris Chirkov as Secreatary Chernoivanenko * Sergei Kurilov as Pyotr Bachei * Ilya Nabatov as Ionel Mirya * Daniil Sagal as Druzhinin * Boris Tenin as Kolesnichuk * Aleksey Vanin * Anna Volgina as Klavdiya Ivanovna (as A. Volgina) == References == == External links == * Category:1956 films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films Category:Russian-language films Category:1956 drama films
title: For the Power of the Soviets
